  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:leno_es_20070518_2_0050207</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>leno_es_20070518_2_0050207</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">Lengua árabe en España: características y extensión</string>
            <string language="en">Arabic language in Spain: characteristics and extension</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Arabische Sprache in Spanien: Eigenschaften
und Extension</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Langage arabe en Espagne : 
caractéristiques et extension</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Língua árabe em Spain: características e
extensão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Lingua araba in Spagna: caratteristiche ed 
estensione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αραβική γλώσσα στην Ισπανία: χαρακτηριστικά και 
επέκταση</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Estudio de la lengua que más influencia ha tenido en el español, después del latín. Referencia a la cultura traída por los árabes.</string>
            <string language="en">Study of the language that has had the greatest influence on Spanish save for Latin. Reference to the culture brought by the Arabs.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Lengua Castellana y Literatura</string>
            <string language="en">Castilian and Literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">Lengua árabe</string>
            <string language="en">The Arabic language</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Studie der Sprache, die den größten Einfluß 
auf Spanischen außer für Latein gehabt hat. Referenz auf der 
Kultur geholt von den Arabern.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Étude du langage qui a eu la plus grande 
influence sur l'Espagnol économiser pour le latin. Référence 
à la culture apportée par les Arabes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estudo da língua que teve a influência a mais 
grande no espanhol excepto para o latin. Referência à cultura 
trazida pelos árabes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studio sul linguaggio che ha avuto l'influenza 
più grande sullo Spagnolo risparmi per Latino. Riferimento alla
coltura portata dagli arabi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μελέτη της γλώσσας που είχε τη μέγιστη επιρροή στα 
ισπανικά εκτός από τα λατινικά. Αναφορά στον πολιτισμό που
παρουσιάζεται από τους Αραβες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Castilian und Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die arabische Sprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Castillan et littérature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le langage arabe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Castilian e literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A língua árabe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Castilian e letteratura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La lingua araba</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Καστιλιάνος και λογοτεχνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η αραβική γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
